response.overview: Aferentti: The Warrior Princess is a fictional fusion of adventure/suspense/drama. The film takes place around  15th-16th Egyptian dynasty era and is centered around the main character Aferentti who is believed to be of royal African blood but devoted her entire existence defending and protecting Egypt from its enemies. A impressive story of determination, fearlessness, & sacrifice. A good story that will stay with you a lifetime. A original screen play written, directed and created by Colored Girl Film Productions members of The Uniq Art Collective subsidiary group.
response.title: Aferentti: The Warrior Princess
